name: 【GGJ 2023】RootBattle AR
description:
Design idea in a nutshell:

Players can run and plant creeps in an AR scene, and creeps will grow as time pass. it is possible for a player to de-root the plant at the early stage (a given time,lets say), but after a while, without any action, it's unable to remove or take action (since the plant has grown into a tree-like monster or whatever). Who has more plants after time limitation win!

We come up with a multiplayer AR game that you spawn plants and try to destroy other players' plants before it's fully grown. TRY to make more fully grown trees to get a higher score.

Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rootbattle-9
